DOC.detailed_description: The first Part : Patients IPGDP regimen chemotherapy follow radiotherapy arm receive 3 cycle IPGDP ( ifosfamide 1.2g/m2 iv day 3-5 ; pegaspargase 2000U/m2 im day 1 ; gemcitabine 800mg/m2 iv day 3,8 ; cisplatin 25 mg/m2 iv day 3-5 ; dexamethasone 20mg/m2 iv day 3-6 ) chemotherapy . Then patient undergo radiotherapy . If disease consider progress stable chemotherapy , patient directly receive radiotherapy . Patients another arm receive radiotherapy follow IPGDP regimen chemotherapy . IPGDP regimen arm 3 cycle , repeat every 3 week . The second Part : Patients receive 6 cycle ifosfamide 1.2g/m2 iv day 3-5 ; pegaspargase 2000U/m2 im day 1 ; gemcitabine 800mg/m2 iv day 3,8 ; cisplatin 25 mg/m2 iv day 3-5 ; dexamethasone 20mg/m2 iv day 3-6 . IPGDP regimen repeat every 3 week . If disease consider progress stable 2 cycle 4 cycle chemotherapy , patient withdraw study .
